tasks.taskDescription:
Make sure you have access to the OneNote. Look at this example of the [Weekly Meeting] template, and complete the following.
	1. Open OneNote
	2. Click "SOP"
	3. Click "Weekly Meeting Example"
	4. Make a copy of it and move it to "Onboarding"
	5. Rename the page to your first and last name.
	6. Find the contact infomration of your subsystem lead or director. Send a message/email asking for access to Jira.
	7. Go back to OneNote, and at the bottom of your personal page, type "I have requested access to Jira by contacting [who you contacted]."
